CustomField.description: To be updated once the "Approvals Initiated" = True This field will be set to 'APPROVED' when All Approval instances have the status as "Approved" This field will be set to "REJECTED" when any of the Approval Instance is Rejected. Default Value: Pending
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To be updated once the "Approvals Initiated" = True This field will be set to 'APPROVED' when All Approval instances have the status as "Approved" This field will be set to "REJECTED" when any of the Approval Instance is Rejected. Default Value: Pending
CustomField.label: Manual Approval Status
